resources.string: Branko Bajcetic is a Computing Science student at Simon Fraser University in Burnaby, B.C, Canada. This game is a project for SFU\'s Software Engineering (CMPT 276) course.\nWebpage: https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav-cms/cmpt276/home
"You are a pilot and you must destroy all of the enemy's submarines with the least amount of sonar missiles."
"Select a spot in the water grid to fire a missile, which will use sonar to find how many submarines are nearby."
"When you click on a grid spot, you'll either see a destroyed submarine if you get a hit, or a number indicating how many hidden submarines" "are still in the same row and column."
"Game Over: Once all submarines are destroyed, your score will be the number of missiles you launched. Lowest score wins!"
